Name: Triteckka: The pure shooter
About the game: The First Bullet Storm 3D Shooting Game. Triteckka is the Bullet storm 3D shooting game. This game is designed for fast phase shooting experience with multiple enemies. Try various characters with various weapons to clear stage and boss. Try the unique system of this game called Boost Shot. Get experience pumping the adrenaline with cool music. Upload the Clear Screenshot! If you clear all stage of this game, take a screenshot of the clear screen and upload steam page! That'll make us work to update stage immediately.XD Background of the Development Once I was a kid, there was a large arcade game center. And I had a lot of time to play arcade game there. Especially, I liked the flight shooting game. And I'm grown up and I learn some skills to make this real. Now I present this to you. The Pure Shooter! This will be the successors and next generation of bullet storm shooting game. There are a lot of works to remain but your supports can help this project come true. Features - 3D bullet dodge shooting game - 5 various weapon system available now - each has the unique characteristic - Unique level system - Various bullet pattern coding - this is quite hard works cuz this is a 3d works - This is working in progress. So feedback can affect this project. Feel the game developing experience by participating to support - Unique BGM with the J trance artist Maozon, Scarfaith
